subject: Booking Confirmation for launch to {destination}
message:
A new booking for {number_of_seats} seat(s) on the launch {mission} to {destination} on {date} has been confirmed. 
 Congratulations!

subject: Launch {mission} Scheduled
message:
The launch {mission} to {destination} has been scheduled for {date}. 
 We will send you a notification when the launch is confirmed.

subject: Invoice {number} Issued for launch {mission}
message:
The invoice {number} for the launch {mission} to {destination} has been issued. 
 The total price is {amount}. 
 Please pay within 30 days.
